name: Robot Pirate Revenge Demo
description:
Help lil Scooter beat back the robot pirate menace, collect booty and go adventuring in this lovingly hand-crafted SNES styled mobile platformer.

A modern 2d mobile platformer with an oldschool 16bit vibe.
Robot Pirate Revenge not only looks like an original SNES title it also feels like one when you play it!

Engaging platforming action with great controls.
From the sky to the depths of the ocean you'll travel thru the Robot Pirate lands beating back the Robot Pirate menace using lil Scooter's trusted slingshot while experiencing great platforming action and the controls to match!

Vibrant 16bit graphics and a one of a kind soundtrack.
The graphics and soundtrack will never disappoint. You'll always want to come back for more!

A family friendly experience for all ages.
Robot Pirate Revenge has no content of an adult nature.
